alert.note: Alert for Duplin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:28PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lenoir and Duplin Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 928 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Bowdens to near Honey Island. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wallace, Warsaw, Mount Olive, Kornegay, Rose Hill, Beulaville, Cypress Creek, Bowdens, Beautancus, Kenansville, Chinquapin, Potters Hill, Albertson, Harrells, Sarecta, Faison, Magnolia, Greenevers, Calypso and Lyman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
